Plot: Former getaway driver Charlie Bronson jeopardizes his Witness Protection Plan identity in order to help his girlfriend get to Los Angeles. The feds and Charlie's former gang chase them on the road.
Title: Hit and Run
Actors: Kristen Bell, Dax Shepard, Tom Arnold, Kristin Chenoweth
tomatoConsensus: Though Hit & Run has some surprisingly oft-kilter filmmaking, the action doesn't add to much and the writing's a bit smug.
